branchCategory.name: Actuator Position Sensor
branchCategory.description: <p>Actuator stroke position sensor is an analog output over the entire length of the stroke.  The D-MP is available in 4 measurement ranges.  Unit is IO-Link compatible.</p>

branchItem.name: Auto Switch, Actuator Position Sensor
branchItem.description: <p>Actuator stroke position sensor is an analog output over the entire length of the stroke.  The D-MP is available in 4 measurement ranges.  Unit is IO-Link compatible.</p>
